pageProduct.name: Schwarzkopf Extra Care Daily Oil Elixir 100ml
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Extra Care DAILY OIL ELIXIR for all hair types is formualted with ARGAN OIL & VITAMIN E for damage repair, suppleness & shine.

EXTRA CARE DAILY OIL ELIXIR offers:
+ DAMAGE REPAIR
+ NOURISHMENT, SUPPLENESS & SHINE
+ NO RESIDUES

Made in Australia

Bottle made from 100% recycled plastic. 100% Recyclable via TerraCycle. Visit TerraCycle.com for more details

Suitable For: All Hair Types

Size: 100mL

Hair Type: All Hair Types

KEY FEATURES

• Damage Repair, Suppleness & Shine
• Bottle made from 100% recycled plastic. 100% Recyclable via TerraCycle. Visit TerraCycle.com for more details

Warnings

Keep bottle out of direct heat & sunlight.

CAUTION

Keep bottle out of direct heat & sunlight.

IMPORTANT INFORMATION

Keep bottle out of direct heat & sunlight.

FLAMMABLE WARNING

No

Ingredients

Cyclomethicone, Dimethiconol, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Argania Spinosa Kernel Oil, Tocopheryl Acetate, Citral, Parfum (Fragrance), Benzyl Alcohol, Geranoil, Hexyl Cinamal, Citronellol, Limonene, Benzyl Salicylate, Alpha-Isomethyl Ionone, Linalool, CI 40800 (Beta-Caratene)

Directions

1. Use on towel-dried hair for SUPPLENESS
2. Use on dry hair to add SHINE
Use sparingly (1-2 pumps) on the mid-lengths and ends of the hair. Keep bottle out of direct heat & sunlight.

SAFETY DIRECTIONS

Keep bottle out of direct heat & sunlight.

RECYCLABLE INFORMATION

Bottle is Kerbside Recyclable. Pump & Cap can be recycled via TerraCycle. Visit TerraCycle.com for details

Recyclable Packaging?: Yes

Recycling Code: 1 PET(E)
